message: Let's make a deal, Bob! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, given the inflation will affect you more than me. Let's end this quickly.
Bob, I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage.  How about we meet in the middle? I'll take $55, you get $45.  Better to settle now than risk losing more value.
